title: Paul Manafort's Sentencing, Beto O'Rourke's 2020 Tease & Trump's "Tim Apple" Gaffe | Rutger Bregman
itunes:title: Paul Manafort's Sentencing, Beto O'Rourke's 2020 Tease & Trump's "Tim Apple" Gaffe | Rutger Bregman
description:
Beto O'Rourke teases a possible 2020 presidential run, President Trump tries to defend his "Tim Apple" gaffe, and historian Rutger Bregman discusses "Utopia for Realists."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
